About Us

SUNBIRD Renewable Energy Systems is the leading manufacturer and installer in Sri Lanka of  Solar Hotwater and Photovoltaic Systems, of international standards, with stringent quality control utilizing raw materials and components that are tropicalized, tested and suited to beat any local weather conditions.

SUNBIRD, the true eco-friendly green solar hot water and photovoltaic systems, takes pride of place amongst the local products, being the recipient of the prestigious

“PRESIDENTIAL AWARD”

in the Energy Category

and

“SLIA PRODUCT AWARD”

presented by the Sri Lanka Institute of Architects,

and Awards for

“MOST INNOVATIVE PRODUCT”

presented by the Institution of Incorporated Engineers of Sri Lanka.

Read more…

SUNBIRD RENEWABLE ENERGY now soars high making new grounds throughout Sri Lanka offering unmatchable quality assurance with a 10year manufacturer warranty on all products with a powerful sales/marketing and after-sales mobile service team covers almost every nook and corner of Sri Lanka with a versatile, efficient, and experienced workforce.

The “Home of SUNBIRD”, their specially-built manufacturing facility and office complex nestles in a spacious greener environment at Welihena, Kochchikade, which is the operational nerve centre for the total service operation in Sri Lanka and overseas.

SUNBIRD was commercially launched in 1991 by gazette notification and registration of the “SUNBIRD” trademark by Jude Fernandopulle Associates (Pvt) Ltd. However, these versatile and economical solar-hot water systems were produced and installed since the inception in 1989 by the JFA-Tropical Homes construction division that builds exclusive homes for deserving quality-conscious clients industrial as well as individuals alike.

Each SUNBIRD Solar Hot-water unit is covered by a 10 -year manufacturer’s warranty and a 60 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE. All Solar PV Energy systems also carry the same warranty and service tradition of SUNBIRD. Giving our clients a distinct direct-cost advantage the system would recover its initial cost by savings on user’s electricity bills, therefore offering our clients a “LIFETIME INVESTMENT” as it is well designed and constructed to last much more than 10 years.

SUNBIRD caters to a wide range of clients from residential, hotels, hospitals and industrial users. However, the major market is the domestic market due to the system’s affordability and the substantial cost-savings for householders. It is also highly recommended by both local and foreign architects and planners for its efficiency, affordability and non-impact on the environment. Their sales network encompasses showrooms at 11 locations islandwide, and is further enhanced by a tie-up with ABANS Ltd., creating an wide-area availability of the products. The company is also very conscious of providing a genuinely dedicated after sales service that has helped them establish and maintain a fine reputation, and has earned loyalty from even the remotest clientele in areas such as Trinco, Vavuniya, Arugambay, Kataragama, Badulla, Nuwara Eliya etc.

With the generally fine weather conditions prevailing in our country, the SUNBIRD Solar Hotwater and PV product range is definitely advantageous to Sri Lankans and expatriates as well.
